虩虩虩

Related Character(s): 虎, 𡭴
Связанный символ (и): тигр, 𡭴

虩字的基本解释

虩
xì
〔虩虩〕恐惧的样子，如“震来虩虩，笑言哑哑。”

虩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》許卻切，入陌，曉。］
亦作“覤1”。亦作“1”。
(1)恐惧。
(2)虫名。蝇虎。

虩字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虍字部】　虩； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1075第53
【唐韻】山責切，音摵。虎驚貌。　又【集韻】迄逆切，音謋。恐懼也。【說文】《易》履虎尾虩，虩，恐懼。　又【玉篇】蠅虎蟲。

虩字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
虩字的起名意思

暂无。

terrified
Basic explanation of words
terrified
xì
〔虩虩] A look of fear, such as "Shocking to 虩虩, laughing and talking dumb."
terrified
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xì］
["Guangyun" Xu Queqie, enter the Mo, Xiao. ]
Also known as "覤1". Also known as "1".
(1) Fear.
(2) Insect name. Fly tiger.
terrified
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji] [Feng Zi Department] 　虩; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 1075 to 53
[Tang Yun] The mountain blames the cut, the sound slams. Tiger looks surprised.　[Jiyun] So far, the sound is inverted. Fear too. [Said the text] "Yi" walks on the tiger's tail with faint, faint, fear.　[Jade articles] Flies, tigers and worms.
